00022 #ifndef uripp_fragment_h
00023 #define uripp_fragment_h
00024 #include "apidefs.h"
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 namespace uripp {
00036     class URIPP_API fragment {
00037     public:
00038         fragment(); 
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 
00043         fragment(const std::string& v);
00044         bool empty() const {return is_null();} 
00045         bool is_null() const {return string_.empty();} 
00046         const std::string& string() const {return string_;} 
00047         std::string encoding() const; 
00048     private:
00049         friend bool URIPP_API parse(std::string::const_iterator& first, std::string::const_iterator last, fragment& v, std::string* errs);
00050         std::string string_;
00051     };
00062     bool URIPP_API parse(std::string::const_iterator& first, std::string::const_iterator last, fragment& v, std::string* errs = 0);
00064     inline std::ostream& operator <<(std::ostream& os, const fragment& v) {return os << v.encoding();}
00065 }
00066 #endif
